title: vElai vaNanguvadE vElai
sahitya:
vElai vaNanguvadE vElai vElan kai vElai vaNangAdu vErenna vElai


anupallavi

  vElai vizhiyil vaittu pAlai mozhiyil vaitta vAlai paruva mangai vaLLi maNALan kai


caraNam    kAlaip-pozhudu mudal mAlai varai kandan kAlait-tozhubavarkku Edu kurai
pAlaip-parugi vaLar bAlan anbar pADip-paravum guNa shIlan vaDi-
